import { useState } from "react"; import "../styles/Auth.css"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Auth = () => { const [isSignup, setIsSignup] = useState(false); return (
{/* الكرت اليسار */}
{!isSignup ? ( <>

Welcome

Smart Classroom Attention Monitoring System

) : ( <>

Create Account

Create your account to start monitoring

)}
{/* الكرت اليمين */}
{!isSignup ? ( <>

Sign In

Don’t have an account? setIsSignup(true)}> Create account

) : ( <>

Sign Up

)}
); }; export default Auth;
